law.text: If any provision of KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902 or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect other provisions or applications of KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902 which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end provisions of KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902 are severable.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 72, effective June 24, 2015.
